Headline: Purple Line Experiencing Delays
ShortDescription: Purple Line trains will be rerouted to the Outer Loop (trains will board and exit on the Brown Line platforms.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple Line trains will be rerouted to the Outer Loop (trains will board and exit on the Brown Line platforms at Clark/Lake, State/Lake, Washington/Wabash, Adams/Wabash, Library/State-Van Buren, LaSalle/Van Buren, Quincy/Wells and Washington/Wells).

Crews are working to correct the problem.

Allow extra travel time.
